item.title: [PMK] Platform9 Internal infrastructure upgrade
item.content:encoded:
High - Scheduled Maintenance In Progress

Platform9 is currently performing scheduled maintenance to upgrade the infrastructure managing the PMK control plane. There may be negligible performance degradation to PMK Management Planes during this time.

Nov 27, 23:40 PST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 27, 20:30 PST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 23, 03:55 PST
Scheduled - Platform9 plans to upgrade the infrastructure managing the PMK control plane. This activity is expected to have no impact on running workloads but may cause negligible performance degradation to PMK Management Planes.

item.title: PMO Web Certificate Rotation
item.content:encoded:
Oct 20, 02:06 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 20, 02:06 PDT
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 20, 00:30 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 20, 00:27 PDT
Scheduled - A scheduled web certificate (.platform9.net) rotation activity for all PMO management planes with platform9.net domain. No downtime is expected, but you may experience a temporary hiccup for a few seconds while accessing your management plane UI.

item.title: PMK Certificate Authority Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Sep 13, 21:47 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Sep 13, 20:35 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 13, 20:34 PDT
Scheduled - An upcoming scheduled maintenance window will be affecting your new node onboarding functionality. Our team is constantly striving to enhance your experience, and this maintenance is a vital measure to ensure that our systems are dependable, secure, and equipped with the latest and greatest features.

Maintenance Details:
Date and Time: September 13th at 8:30 PM PDT (September 14th at 9 am IST)
Expected Duration: Approximately 1.5 hours
Affected Services: Temporary service outage for new node onboard.

We anticipate that the impact will be minimal, and our team will work diligently to complete the maintenance as quickly as possible.

Customer Support:
Our support team will be available throughout the maintenance window to address any concerns or questions you might have. If you experience any issues outside the maintenance window, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at https://support.platform9.com/

item.title: [Intermittent] Degraded Access to Management Planes
item.content:encoded:
Sep 6, 04:59 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 5, 23:42 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 5, 13:48 PDT
Identified - We've identified a related bottleneck where we're observing network congestion on the backend and we've formulated a plan to attempt to mitigate it. The management plane may still be unstable at this time until we've taken these full mitigation steps.

Sep 5, 10:31 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Sep 5, 10:31 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue impacting multiple customers' ability to access their management plane instances. Attempts will sometimes result in 502 errors.

We will continue to update this post as more details become available.

Our team is constantly striving to enhance your experience, and this maintenance is a vital measure to ensure that our systems are dependable, secure, and equipped with the latest and greatest features.

Maintenance Details:

Expected Duration: Approximately 1.5 hours
Affected Services: Temporary service outage for new node onboard.

We anticipate that the impact will be minimal, and our team will work diligently to complete the maintenance as quickly as possible.

Customer Support:
Our support team will be available throughout the maintenance window to address any concerns or questions you might have. If you experience any issues outside the maintenance window, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at https://support.platform9.com/

item.title: DNS Resolution Issues
item.content:encoded:
Jul 27, 14:04 PDT
Resolved - The incident may be considered resolved. No further interruptions have been observed nor reported.

Jul 27, 13:24 PDT
Monitoring - Our Operations team has taken steps to resolve the issue. No further interruptions are anticipated at this time. Our team will continue to monitor the affected environments.

Jul 27, 13:22 PDT
Identified - We've identified the issue with the automated DNS component which was causing issues properly synchronizing CNAME records for our Platform9 management plane instances. Our Operations team is taking steps to restore.

Jul 27, 12:57 PDT
Investigating - We're currently investigating reports of issues related to DNS resolution, especially with regard to the Platform9 management plane endpoint. Hosts may intermittently or temporarily show as disconnected. Cluster workloads should remain unaffected.

item.title: Majority of Free Tier users are unable to access their system
item.content:encoded:

Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 13, 19:23 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and environments should start recovering soon

Mar 13, 17:53 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating the issue

item.title: Some management planes are intermittently unreachable
item.content:encoded:
Feb 16, 03:45 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 15, 18:46 PST
Investigating - We are investigating issues with our infrastructure provider.

item.title: (Retroactive) Connectivity issue reaching management planes
item.content:encoded:
Dec 15, 07:30 PST
Resolved - There were intermittent issues reaching management planes between 2021-12-15 15:22 - 2021-12-15 16:02 UTC. This resulted from an Internet connectivity outage at our hosting provider (Amazon Web Services). Connectivity has now been restored.

item.content:encoded:

Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 15, 06:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 14, 13:54 PDT
Scheduled - We will be performing maintenance on our external network. The operation will be brief and you may experience intermittent connectivity issues to your Platform9 Management Plane during the maintenance. There will be no impact to running workloads

item.title: Platform9 management planes are unreachable
item.content:encoded:
May 10, 00:50 PDT
Resolved - The network issue has been resolved.

May 9, 23:00 PDT
Identified - The issue has been identifed to be a network issue with our Data Center service provider. They are working to resolve it.

May 9, 22:34 PDT
Investigating - Certain customers cannot reach their management plane deployments. We are currently investigating the issue.

item.title: Cloud Backend Circuit Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Nov 5, 19:11 PST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 5, 19:00 PST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 26, 09:30 PDT
Scheduled - Please allow this message to serve as a formal written notification that the Platform9 Cloud team will perform scheduled maintenance that may impact your cloud/service.

Purpose of the maintenance: Our data center provider will be performing maintenance on our primary circuit that connects to our SaaS backend. Services will be in a degraded state for the duration of this maintenance.

Maintenance Time: The maintenance will be performed Thursday, Nov. 5th during a 1-hour window between 7 PM and 8 PM PDT. You can expect approximately 5 minutes of downtime at some point during the maintenance period.

Expected Customer Impact: During the downtime portion of the maintenance, the management plane may not be available to access.

If you have any questions or concerns, please email us at support@platform9.com

item.title: Platform9 management planes are unreachable
item.content:encoded:
Oct 13, 08:55 PDT
Resolved - No issues reported after monitoring the fix for 5 hours. With customers able to access their management plane, the issue stands resolved.

Oct 13, 06:43 PDT
Update - The situation is still being monitored. So far, no issues have been reported.

Oct 13, 03:01 PDT
Monitoring - Our vendor has identified and implemented a fix. Affected customers are now able to access their management plane.

Oct 13, 02:35 PDT
Identified - Certain customers cannot reach their management plane deployments. It has been identifed to be a network issue with our Data Center service provider. They are working to resolve it

item.title: Platform9 Cloud Network Edge Upgrade
item.content:encoded:
Oct 7, 20:39 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 7, 20:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 2, 13:06 PDT
Scheduled - Purpose of the maintenance: We will be upgrading the software on our edge network equipment to increase the stability of Platform9 services.

Maintenance Time: The maintenance will be performed Wednesday, Oct. 7th during a 2-hour window between 8 PM and 10 PM PDT. You can expect approximately 5 minutes of downtime at some point during the maintenance period.

Expected Customer Impact: During the downtime portion of the maintenance, the management plane may not be available to access.

If you have any questions or concerns, please email us at support@platform9.com

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Customer management planes may experience brief increased API error rates when traffic is failed over
